title: Victory for Longtime Immigrants at Supreme Court
itunes:title: Victory for Longtime Immigrants at Supreme Court
description:
Leon Fresco, a partner at Holland & Knight, discusses the Supreme Court giving a victory to longtime immigrants who entered the country illegally but now have strong ties to the community.

Madison Alder, Bloomberg Law Reporter, discusses hearings for judicial nominees and how the Biden administration got an early start on vetting potential judicial nominees.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
